kw.name: Login To System
Open Login Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
Opens the login page and waits for it to load

kw.name: Input Username
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters username in the username field

kw.name: Input Password
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Enters password in the password field

kw.name: Submit Login
Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
Clicks the login button and waits for the page to load
Complete login flow with default or custom credentials

kw.name: Verify Login Failed
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//p[contains(@class,'Form_error')]' contains text 'Invalid Username or Password'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
Verifies that login failed with error message

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
